articles.description: Before Club Brugge face Aston Villa on Tuesday, manager Nicky Hayen is being touted as one of Europe's "hottest properties".
articles.title: Nicky Hayen: From managing Haverfordwest to the Champions League with Club Brugge

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and radio commentary from Nottingham Forest vs Ipswich Town in the FA Cup fifth round.
articles.title: FA Cup fifth round LIVE: Nottingham Forest vs Ipswich Town - radio and live updates

articles.description: Vinicius Jr says he is "living the dream" at Real Madrid and wants to sign a new deal with the Champions League holders.
articles.title: Vinicius Jr: Real Madrid forward wants to sign new deal amid Saudi interest

articles.description: From this summer goalkeepers will be allowed eight seconds from catching the ball to releasing it, in the latest attempt to cut down on time-wasting.
articles.title: What is the new eight second goalkeeper rule in football?

articles.description: Their performances and certain advantages mean India are favourites for the Champions Trophy, but they can be beaten.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: India favourites but can be beaten by Australia

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at Manchester United's attacking shortcomings and Rasmus Hojlund's goal drought.
articles.title: Rasmus Hojlund: Why is Manchester United striker in goal drought?

articles.description: The NFL could soon have its own two-way superstar, but Draft prospect Travis Hunter is such a rarity that teams are unsure what to do with him.
articles.title: Travis Hunter: Which NFL team will draft him? And what is a two-way player?

articles.description: Comments on social media body-shaming Britain's Commonwealth 10,000m champion Eilish McColgan are "ridiculous and stupid", says her mother and coach Liz.
articles.title: Eilish McColgan: Mother Liz says body-shaming 'demeaning and abusive'

articles.description: Jurrien Timber says Arsenal can "change the narrative" of their season if they can beat PSV Eindhoven in their Champions League last-16 tie.
articles.title: PSV v Arsenal: Gunners defender says club can change season's narrative in Champions League

articles.description: Former Real Madrid captain Sergio Ramos scores his first goal for Monterrey since joining Mexican side, while Lionel Messi left out by Inter Miami.
articles.title: Sergio Ramos scores first Monterrey goal and Lionel Messi left out by Inter Miami
